DOC.brief_summary: A descriptive post-intervention study design provide data decision-makers Kenyan Ministry Health , Extending Service Delivery Project ( ESD ) , Pathfinder International whether scale-up ESD Project 's postabortion care ( PAC ) service package . Approximately three month data collect follow introduction postabortion care job aid eight public sector health facility Central Province Nairobi , Kenya . Postabortion client provider interview ; facility provide PAC service inventoried use facility checklist .
DOC.brief_title: Integrating Family Planning Into Postabortion Care
DOC.detailed_description: A descriptive post-intervention study design provide data decision-makers Kenyan Ministry Health , Extending Service Delivery Project ( ESD ) , Pathfinder International whether scale-up ESD Project 's postabortion care ( PAC ) service package . Approximately three month data collect follow introduction postabortion care job aid eight public sector health facility Central Province Nairobi , Kenya . Postabortion client provider interview ; facility provide PAC service inventoried use facility checklist .
DOC.criteria: For Facilities : APHIA II facility support ESD project Central Province Nairobi , Kenya : ( 1 ) PAC service provide , ( 2 ) least one provider receive PAC Youthfriendly PAC training , ( 3 ) Community mobilization initiate , ( 4 ) PAC equipment supply procure , ( 5 ) PAC job aid distribute . For Clients : Women age 15 year old receive PAC service study facility telephone contact For Providers : Any person offer PAC service study facility
